mapper.update: update msb_pubsubsubscription set serviceID = #{serviceid}, nodeID = #{nodeid}, id = #{id}, jid = #{jid}, owner = #{owner}, state = #{state}, deliver = #{deliver}, digest = #{digest}, digest_frequency = #{digestFrequency}, expire = #{expire}, includeBody = #{includebody}, showValues = #{showvalues}, subscriptionType = #{subscriptiontype}, subscriptionDepth = #{subscriptiondepth}, keyword = #{keyword} where serviceID = #{serviceid};
